hero.title: Streamline Your Service Bookings
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform for service providers and customers.

1.title: Find & Book Services
1.description: Easily browse categories like salons, doctors, tutors and book appointments instantly.

2.title: Create Your Brand
2.description: Set up a business page, list services, and manage your team all in one place.

3.title: Flexible Scheduling
3.description: Manage your availability across multiple brands with powerful scheduling tools.

4.title: Smart Management
4.description: Track bookings, manage workers, and grow your customer base efficiently.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for your goals

anyone.title: For Every Booking Need
anyone.description: No matter the business — manage any service that requires appointments or schedules.

salon.title: For Salons
salon.description: Manage stylists, appointments and client history.

clinic.title: For Clinics
clinic.description: Schedule patients, sync calendars and track visits.

tutor.title: For Tutors
tutor.description: Organize lessons, track attendance and payments.

1.question: Can I manage multiple brands?
1.answer: Yes, with the Professional and Team plans, you can create and manage multiple brand profiles.

2.question: How many workers can I add?
2.answer: Free plan allows up to 2 workers. Pro supports 10, and Team has no limit.

3.question: Is there support for teams?
3.answer: Yes, the Team plan is designed for collaborative teams with advanced access and reporting.
